response.original_title: Na konci nějak pojmenovat ty věci aneb Zkurvených 294,5 km
response.overview: Martin Imrich lives and studies in Prague. But he comes from South Moravia, where he makes a pilgrimage on foot to overcome the contradiction between “tím, kým jsem, a tím, kým jsu” (“who I am” in Czech and the Moravian dialect), as he says. His video diary, accompanied by a frank off-screen commentary, captures in fragmentary form the journey to the roots and the search for the meaning of such an artistic project.
response.title: Try to Name Those Things at the End or All Those Fucking 294,5 km
